price: Dan Kami ikutkanlah laknat kepada mereka di dunia ini dan pada hari kiamat mereka termasuk orang-orang yang dijauhkan (dari rahmat Allah).
arabic: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-atbaʿnāhum fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati hum mina al-maqbūḥīna
translations: And We caused to follow them
